body:
With #569 merged and deployed, we are now using Auth0 and LDAP to authenticate users. We are still storing the most recent password the users used. We can remove those passwords later, after things have settled a bit.

@relud I think we'll want to do this manually; I don't think that having an automated migration to do this would be a good idea, since it runs in all environments every time they are initialized, and most of the time that is developer environments where we still use username/password login.
